channel.title: Need Webclient help
channel.description:
Hi, im a noob here but oh well. :|
My problem is i just paid for a domain, vps and web hosting to run my weblcient off, im running PI DSPK source.
When i try to run it through the webclient the java applet loads then i get an error message.
The error message is this: [code]load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://betascape.info/Admin/client/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 9 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class[/code]
I've followed just about every guide on google and i can't get it too work, just post how i can fix this here.
Thanks

item.title: Need Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Paying for services isn’t allowed.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_C_oder_P_erses wrote:

@ All Lol Get Back On Topic…
And Dude, Move Client.class Around Because It Said It Can’t Find It… So Yeah, Just Trying To Help… Make Extra File Just Incase I Am Wrong Just Trying ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Need Webclient help

item.description:
@harlan102 wrote:

What’s everyone complaining about lol?

This is the deal if anyone can setup a working webclient to go with my server + cache i’ll pay you $10.

My msn is harlan102@live.com

item.title: Need Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Vengpwe Vengpwe
item.description:
@Vengpwe wrote:

[quote=“complexion-x, post:6, topic:374642”]@Vengpwe

Sorry to tell you but Mopar doesn’t revolve around Rep. Just because you have rep, it doesn’t mean you know anything. To be honest, I have my own webclient and I know how to make them so you can shut the fuck up.[/quote]

I never said anything about rep dude? Read before commenting…

I said: “Find someone with EXPERIENCE about webclients”

Read full topic

item.title: Need Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @harlan102 harlan102
item.description:
@harlan102 wrote:

Hi, im a noob here but oh well.

My problem is i just paid for a domain, vps and web hosting to run my weblcient off, im running PI DSPK source.

When i try to run it through the webclient the java applet loads then i get an error message.

The error message is this:

load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://betascape.info/Admin/client/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 9 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class

I’ve followed just about every guide on google and i can’t get it too work, just post how i can fix this here.

Thanks

Read full topic
